privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy (GDPR)
privacy_policy.body:
1. Data Controller
Florian Di Vrusa (FlorisNexus), acting as a side-activity freelancer, is responsible for data processing.


2. Collection & Purpose
We practice data minimization. The only data collected are:

  • Information sent voluntarily by email (contact@florisnexus.com).
  • Data necessary for SaaS account management (login email).
No third-party tracking cookies are used.


3. 'Offline-First' Confidentiality
For the Finova tool, no processed financial data (IBAN, VAT) is stored on our servers. Processing takes place locally within your browser.


4. Your Rights
In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data. Contact us at contact@florisnexus.com for any requests.
